name: Orpheus (itch)
description:
"Orphues" has obvious references in Greek mythology, above all in what the story tells, how its story is developed and how its characters are motivated.
Orpheus was a person with an extraordinary gift for music, and could even work miracles with her, and still use his gift for amorous purposes
In spite of having good intentions, the final destiny of Eurydice, his partner that he tried to rescue, was something horrible, and everything by his fault, something that tormented him for the rest of his existence.
A hero for some and a cretin for others.

In this game you will be incarnated in Dan, a person in a situation similar to Orpheus, inspired by his story, who intends to bring his partner back.

How to play:

-Arrow keys to move.

-Space to interact.
